00317 class NonbondedForce::ParticleInfo {
00318 public:
00319     double charge, sigma, epsilon;
00320     ParticleInfo() {
00321         charge = sigma = epsilon = 0.0;
00322     }

00332 class NonbondedForce::ExceptionInfo {
00333 public:
00334     int particle1, particle2;
00335     double chargeProd, sigma, epsilon;
00336     ExceptionInfo() {
00337         particle1 = particle2 = -1;
00338         chargeProd = sigma = epsilon = 0.0;
00339     }
00340     ExceptionInfo(int particle1, int particle2, double chargeProd, double sigma, double epsilon) :

00342     }
